main event: Two bright red lights were observed in the sky over Cincinnati on January 1, 1968.
interesting points: Sighting lasted approximately 15 seconds., The lights changed positions relative to each other., The lower light dimmed and disappeared before the upper light., Witnesses described the lights as being steady and bright, resembling stars., The objects were reported to have no associated sound during the sighting.
witness description: The witnesses included multiple individuals who were observing the lights together.
